sourcesContent:
<template>
  <HelloWorld msg="Sorts :" />

  <label>Search searchName : </label>
  <input type="text" id="search_name_val" v-model="searchName" />

  <searchName />
  <searchSchool />
  <searchBranches />
  
  {{spellSearch}}
</template>

<script>
import HelloWorld from "./components/HelloWorld.vue";
import searchSchool from "./components/formSearchSchool.vue";
import searchBranches from "./components/formSearchBranches.vue";
import data from "./assets/data.min.js"; // Lien vers toutes les données

export default {
  name: "App",
  components: {
    HelloWorld,
    searchSchool,
    searchBranches,
  },
  data: function () {
    return { searchName: "" };
  },
    computed:  {
    spellSearch(){
      // On récupère les data de la base JS qu'on importe,
       
      return data.filter(spell => spell[1].startsWith(this.searchName));
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
